sentence.Network_en: There was little relaxation of that suspiciousness with which many Americans regard their fellow - travelers.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多美国人对待旅伴的那种猜疑却丝毫也没有减弱.

sentence.Network_en: The situation had provoked huge suspiciousness among the western media.

sentence.Network_en: Shyness or suspiciousness when not socialized enough.
sentence.Network_cn: 因交际不够而变得羞却多疑.
